name: Lightning-57
description:
By Wilhelm Tyranid Lancaster

--WARNING! FLASHING LIGHTS!--

A routine mission goes haywire as an attack of unprecedented scale by the Luftwaffe annihilates your squadron. Now, it's up to you to bring this threat down, once and for all, with only your skills as a pilot, and your limitless reserves of machine gun ammo. But beware! The enemy has the power of the occult on their side, and there's no telling where they'll drag you, or who you'll fight, so brace yourself and give them hell!

This is an old school project game I've decided to update and place online for any who would be interested. The game is coded in Processing 3 (So, Java. And it's open-source!). I hope you enjoy it for what it is should you choose to play it.

~ W.T.L
